body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Nature     Natural Features & Ecosystems               Natural Features & Ecosystems       The variety of natural features and ecosystems found within Great Basin National Park, and the larger region, is surprising to many first time visitors. The Great Basin has often been stereotyped as barren and uninteresting.  But it doesn't take long, once off the beaten path, to discover that this rugged landscape, with its desert valleys and snow covered peaks, houses much more than meets the eye.
title: Great Basin National Park: Natural Features & Ecosystems
